okay, i'm new and this is my first post, so here goes.
this rpg is beast wars continuity, right? so what if something happens, and 
we all get shifted into the future. say, maybe...2002? it'd be fun to se how 
we respond in a g1/R.I.D. type atmosphere. and I wouldn't look so stupid 
playing two cars in a beast wars rpg.

--part1_9b.2175c216.297c32e3_boundary
